title: I cant launch the league of legends client
body: Hey my name is LLDandyman. Although I am an avid Lol player ,I end up playing 1-3 games per day but the most important thing is that after getting the newest update the coolest feature is........NOT BEING ABLE TO play. Now im not saying Im quitting or any shit like that I just wanna know if this is just me or if this is a problem with this patch. So far im stuck on the launch screen with the NA server being unavalable , The launch button greyed out and the little warning Icon that tells me people are being stuck in lobbys.

replies.body: This was a live service incident that caused the Login Service to go down. After some investigation and troubleshooting, we were able to resolve the issue and bring it back up. You should have no issues logging in, but if you do, let me know.
Look for a post titled "riot compensation for downed server" and spread the word
